title: Wanting To Buy 40 Old Mill T206's For Personal Set
author: Ronnie73

posts.post_title: Wanting To Buy 40 Old Mill T206's For Personal Set
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone, currently I'm looking to add the following T206 Old Mill Backs to my personal set. I'm looking for lower grade raw or PSA/SGC 1’s to 3’s that have very little or no paper loss, untrimmed, and no ink marks. Just looking for good honest wear. Higher grades are fine if the price is right. You can PM me and or send me an email with scans and prices at [url]d2ad2a@aol.com[/url]  I’m aware that some of these cards are currently listed for sale on Ebay but are way over priced. This list of Old Mill cards are actually from the more common print runs that tend to have higher populations.

Thanks in advance for everyone’s help. I’m starting with this list of 41 cards.
I don’t have much for trading except for a few Sweet Caporal 350-460 Factory 30 “No Print” Scraps. I sell common players for $1000 and HOF’ers at $1400. If your interested in a list of what I currently have available, just ask, or you can look at high quality front & back scans at [URL="http://www.comicplace.com/t206noprints/t206.html"]T206 No Prints[/URL]. Most of the time I make purchases using PayPal Friend’s & Family.

Old Mill Backs Only
